mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into d_fund_info(id,asset_level,asset_prop,bank_no,begin_balance,branch_no,cash_balance,check_balance,check_str,client_group,client_id,client_name,corp_client_group,corp_risk_level,correct_balance,current_balance,fine_integral,foregift_balance,frozen_balance,fund_account,integral_balance,integral_update,interest,interest_tax,limit_flag,money_type,mortgage_balance,position_str,rate_kind,risk_level,room_code,square_flag,unfrozen_balance) values(#{id},#{assetLevel},#{assetProp},#{bankNo},#{beginBalance},#{branchNo},#{cashBalance},#{checkBalance},#{checkStr},#{clientGroup},#{clientId},#{clientName},#{corpClientGroup},#{corpRiskLevel},#{correctBalance},#{currentBalance},#{fineIntegral},#{foregiftBalance},#{frozenBalance},#{fundAccount},#{integralBalance},#{integralUpdate},#{interest},#{interestTax},#{limitFlag},#{moneyType},#{mortgageBalance},#{positionStr},#{rateKind},#{riskLevel},#{roomCode},#{squareFlag},#{unfrozenBalance})
mapper.update:
update d_fund_info
id=#{id},
asset_level=#{asset_level},
asset_prop=#{asset_prop},
bank_no=#{bank_no},
begin_balance=#{begin_balance},
branch_no=#{branch_no},
cash_balance=#{cash_balance},
check_balance=#{check_balance},
check_str=#{check_str},
client_group=#{client_group},
client_id=#{client_id},
client_name=#{client_name},
corp_client_group=#{corp_client_group},
corp_risk_level=#{corp_risk_level},
correct_balance=#{correct_balance},
current_balance=#{current_balance},
fine_integral=#{fine_integral},
foregift_balance=#{foregift_balance},
frozen_balance=#{frozen_balance},
fund_account=#{fund_account},
integral_balance=#{integral_balance},
integral_update=#{integral_update},
interest=#{interest},
interest_tax=#{interest_tax},
limit_flag=#{limit_flag},
money_type=#{money_type},
mortgage_balance=#{mortgage_balance},
position_str=#{position_str},
rate_kind=#{rate_kind},
risk_level=#{risk_level},
room_code=#{room_code},
square_flag=#{square_flag},
unfrozen_balance=#{unfrozen_balance},
where id=#{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from d_fund_info where id in
#{item.id}
